title: Megan Thee Stallion Rings in ‘Hot Girl Fall’ on Tonight Show
text:
“Hot Girl Summer” rapper Megan Thee Stallion has wisely aligned her personal brand with hotness, both of the personal variety and the seasonal kind, but during Monday night’s The Tonight Show, she segued her brand as naturally as the changing of the seasons to “Hot Girl Fall,” with help from Jimmy Fallon. It’s basically your previously established hot girl summer activities, except you get to wear head-to-toe plaid and buy matching vests with your dog, played in the video by Megan’s real dog 4oe. So don’t give up your cut-offs and your body glitter just because the temperature is dropping. Enjoy them simultaneously with your multiple pies and jack-o-lantern full of wine. Use this time to prepare yourself for the savageness of Hot Girl Winter.

Related
description: Rapper Megan the Stallion stopped by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon to duet with Jimmy Fallon on “Hot Girl Fall,” a parody of her song “Hot Girl Summer.”
